oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Administration Building facing West
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings; Educational facilities; Barry Hall (Administration Building)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Christian Brothers College's Administration Building (later known as Barry Hall) was designed by the Architects Regan and Weller.
It was the second building to be constructed on the East Parkway campus.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Regan and Weller, Architects
